mapper.insert: insert into t_blog (id, appreciation, commentabled, content, create_time, first_picture, flag, published, recommend, share_statement, title, update_time, views, `description`, type_id, tag_ids) values (#{id}, #{appreciation}, #{commentabled}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{firstPicture}, #{flag}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{shareStatement}, #{title}, #{updateTime}, #{views},#{description},#{typeId},#{tagIds});
mapper.select: select year(b.update_time) year, count(year(b.update_time)) count from t_blog b group by year order by year desc;
